cause.description:
The Wesley Foundation at Oklahoma State University is a ministry of the United Methodist Church. It is our duty to make disciples of Jesus Christ. In the process of fulfilling our calling we create leaders for the Church and offer life transformative experiences for college students.
Students are constantly involved in global and local missions.
Funding given to this cause will be used for support of student mission trips both local and global.
1. Making Disciples of Jesus Christ
2. Create Leaders for the Church
3. Transform Lives
cause.name: Wesley Foundation at Oklahoma State University
